price: 164. Moko te okati na biso, sé azali na esika eyebani.
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
